title: Windows 11 might steal a popular macOS feature
description: AI is slowly making its way everywhere, and soon, it might be able to make your Windows 11 wallpapers look way cooler.

title: Hermès removes all leather Apple Watch bands from its site
description: It's not yet clear if the move confirms recent reports that partner Apple is planning to pivot away from leather accessories for its range of devices.

title: Telepresence classroom robots trialed for absent students
description: A school in Japan will deploy telepresence robots that can be controlled by absent students in the hope that it may encourage them to return to the classroom.

title: Uber might launch a handyperson service like TaskRabbit
description: Code found in Uber's iPhone app suggests the company is exploring the idea of launching a service similar to TaskRabbit.
